Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
Meta-Analysis: Funding for the meta-analysis provided by NIH grant U19CA148537.
de novo Genotyping: We would like to acknowledge the NCRN nurses and Consultants for their work in the UKGPCS study. We thank all the patients who took part in this study. This work was supported by Cancer Research UK (grant numbers C5047/A7357, C1287/A10118, C1287/A5260, C5047/A3354, C5047/A10692, C16913/A6135 and C16913/A6835). We would also like to thank the following for funding support: Prostate Research Campaign UK (now Prostate Cancer UK), The Institute of Cancer Research and The Everyman Campaign, The National Cancer Research Network UK, The National Cancer Research Institute (NCRI) UK. We are grateful for support of NIHR funding to the NIHR Biomedical Research Centre at The Institute of Cancer Research and The Royal Marsden NHS Foundation Trust. The MEC was supported by NIH grants CA63464, CA54281 and CA098758.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Prostate Cancer, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PC-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Prostate Cancer. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Prostate Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Prostate Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
